eloDescription: Elo is a rating system used to calculate the relative skill level of players. The higher your Elo, the stronger you are compared to others. Winning increases your Elo, while losing decreases it.
noGamesYet: No games yet! Click Play to create a new one.
failedToLoadGames: Failed to load games. Please try again.
withdrawMessage: If you withdraw from this game it will count as a loss and that will lower your Elo, are you sure you want to withdraw?
randomGameInfo: For randomly generated games, the game will use the army you've created for the selected battle mode. You can view and manage your armies in the <0>Army Compositions</0>. If you haven't created any armies for that mode yet, a default army will be used.
selectGameMode: Select the game mode from the options below.

matchmakingQueue.inQueue: You are now in the matchmaking queue! The system is searching for another player who has selected the same settings as you.
matchmakingQueue.matchFound: Once a match is found, you will be redirected to the game.

matchmakingDescription: Matchmaking mode lets you quickly join a game with random players using predefined settings.
onlyPartyLeaderCanSearch: Only the party leader can search for a match.

partySearchStatus.leaderDescription: You can search for a match. Your party members will be notified when you start searching.
partySearchStatus.memberDescription: Only the party leader can search for a match. You will be notified when they start searching.

customDescription: Custom mode lets you set up a game with specific settings and invite friends to play.

afkWarning.title: You are AFK
afkWarning.message: You have been inactive for too long. Your orders will be submitted automatically to prevent game delays.

importScenarioModal.importInfo: You can import any scenario you want.
importScenarioModal.createInfo: You can even create your own scenarios in the <scenarioEditorLink/>.
importScenarioModal.createInfo2: Or explore the <0>Community Hub</0> for ready-made scenarios.

scenarioEditorTags.tutorialMessage: Not sure how to use it? Don't worry, we've got you covered! <tutorialLink>Watch the tutorial here.</tutorialLink>
scenarioEditorTags.randomGuide: Want to learn how to create random maps? Read <0>this guide</0>.

deploymentStateMessage: This is the deployment stage. Take this turn to place your units where you want within the deployment zone. When you're finished, submit your orders to apply the placement.

unitDescription.1: The humble line infantry battalion is the basic unit of the army. The musket is its primary weapon, but it can also fend off cavalry or charge other infantry and artillery with the bayonet.
unitDescription.2: Reliable, well-rounded medium cavalry fit for harassment as well as prolonged fighting.
unitDescription.3: Affordable medium artillery with modest mobility and firepower, together with impressive canister fire.
unitDescription.4: Experienced, physically imposing soldiers with the ability to inspire friendly soldiers and terrify enemies. These elite units are exclusive to the most naturally gifted soldiers, which makes them much more expensive to field. Their intimidation and excellent melee characteristics are put to best use in a bayonet charge.
unitDescription.7: Elite line infantry trained with a special focus on rapid movement and marksmanship.
unitDescription.11: Light cavalry suited to attacking weak, damaged, and routing enemies. However, they will struggle against organized infantry and heavy cavalry. Use infantry and artillery to weaken the enemy first.
unitDescription.5: Elite light cavalry that use the lance to deliver devastating charges - a series of charges by multiple Lancer squadrons will swiftly rout any opposition. However, they're much less impressive in a drawn-out melee.
unitDescription.8: Formidable heavy cavalry with the strongest all-around melee combat effectiveness of any unit. However, it's still best to weaken the enemy with infantry or artillery before sending in your Cuirassiers.
unitDescription.12: The heaviest field gun available to the Napoleonic army; while these batteries are extremely expensive, their range and power are unmatched.
unitDescription.6: This artillery's speed and low cost make it suitable for supporting cavalry or advancing alongside your infantry line.
unitDescription.9: Light field howitzers with explosive shells and particularly lethal short-range canister fire - ideal for supporting your infantry line at medium to short range.
unitDescription.10: ‚ÄúTo place any dependence upon militia is assuredly resting upon a broken staff.‚Äù - George Washington
unitDescription.13: ‚ÄúThe Bashkir horse archers are undoubtedly the world's least dangerous troops.‚Äù - Baron Marbot, ignoring an arrow in his thigh
unitDescription.14: These shock troops are made up the tallest, strongest, and most imposing men of the line infantry. While they're generally more fearsome than average line troops, their most powerful option in combat is their devastating charge.
unitDescription.15: The lightest common field artillery of the Napoleonic Wars, with modest firepower and good mobility that make it a natural companion to the infantry.
unitDescription.16: Napoleonic battalions would detach these small companies of loose-order troops, such as Voltigeurs and Jaegers, to carry out a variety of duties. These troops would occupy terrain unsuitable to large infantry units, harass the enemy line, and screen the army to fend off enemy skirmishers.
unitDescription.17: While rifles of the Napoleonic era offer a much lower rate of fire than muskets, they compensated with excellent accuracy that helped win skirmishing duels, pick off enemy officers, and harass enemy artillery from a distance.
unitDescription.18: Napoleon favored the 6lb cannon for its balance of power and maneuverability; as the Napoleonic Wars wore on, he sought to replace the 4 and 8lb guns with as many 6 and 12lb guns as possible.
unitDescription.19: The Napoleonic rocket was an experimental, temperamental weapon with persistent accuracy issues. However, it boasts high maneuverability, a substantial explosive payload that's effective against terrain, and can deal excellent organizational damage at close range.
unitDescription.24: The 10-pounder licorne was a Russian artillery piece used in the Napoleonic Wars. It combined features of cannons and howitzers, allowing it to fire both solid shot and explosive shells, and was valued for its versatility and range.
unitDescription.25: The 18-pounder licorne was a Russian artillery piece of the Napoleonic Wars, combining the roles of cannon and howitzer. It could fire both solid shot and explosive shells, making it effective for long-range bombardment and battlefield support.

name: Name

networkErrorModal.title: Oops! Connection Lost
networkErrorModal.message: Seems like the connection failed. Don't worry! You can still enjoy playing offline.

needsUpdateModal.title: Update required
needsUpdateModal.message: A new version of LoB is available! Please update to the latest version to continue playing online.

reserveAmmoDescription: Unspent gold contributes to your reserve artillery ammo, extra ammunition your arty can fire after spending all of the ammo they carry into battle.
armyInvalid: This army is invalid, please modify it.

landing.title: Welcome to <0/>
landing.message: Lines of Battle is a multiplayer, simultaneous turn-based strategy game set during the Napoleonic Wars. Designed for tactical depth and historical immersion, you'll engage in epic battles against others, using skill and strategy to outmaneuver and defeat your opponents!
landing.privacy: By starting, you agree to our <0>Privacy Policy</0>.

welcomeModal.title: Welcome to Lines of Battle üëã
welcomeModal.p1: New to Lines of Battle? I recommend starting with an offline practice game against a bot to familiarize yourself with the game mechanics and develop your strategy in a relaxed environment.
welcomeModal.p2: Since the game is currently in beta, I invite you to join the <discordLink>Discord server</discordLink> to connect with other players, find opponents to play with, report bugs, and share your ideas to help improve the game experience for everyone!

submitOrdersConfirmation: Are you sure you want to submit your battle orders? Once submitted, you won't be able to go back.

battleOverview.title: Battle Overview
battleOverview.timeUnderPressureTooltip: Time under pressure is the time a team has the <0>{{percentage}}%</0> of the objectives or less. The longer a team is under pressure, the more victory points they lose.

offerDrawModal.alreadyWantsDrawMessage: You are already offering a Draw. Do you want to withdraw this offer?
offerDrawModal.offerDrawMessage: If you offer a draw, this option will remain enabled until you disable it.

offlineDescription: Practice against bots and play hotseat with friends on the same device!

premiumCurrencyLeaderboard.title: <premiumCurrency/> Leaderboard
premiumCurrencyLeaderboard.subtitle: Who has the greatest <premiumCurrency/>?
premiumCurrencyLeaderboard.description: Want to be the first? <storeLink>Go to the store</storeLink> and get <premiumCurrency/>!

hybridDescription: Hybrid maps use non-random, preset terrain, but enable players to use their own custom armies to play.

playLastActionsModal.message:
New battle events have occurred while you were away.
Would you like to see the actions from the latest turn?

deleteClanModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete <0>{{clanName}}</0>? All members will be removed from the coalition, and this action cannot be undone.

joinClanModal.message: Do you want to join <0>{{clanName}}</0>? Once you have sent your request, you will have to wait for one of the members to accept it. The request expires after {{expirationDays}} days.

cancelJoinRequestModal.message: Are you sure you want to cancel your join request for <0>{{clanName}}</0>?

p1.processed: Orders processed by the server. Now, wait for the others to make their move.

ordersSubmittedDialog.p2: Checking for the opponent's orders in {{value}} seconds

leaveClanModal.message: Are you sure you want to leave <0>{{clanName}}</0>?

cancelTournamentMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel the tournament?
tournamentPasswordNote: Tournaments with password are considered private and they don't give Elo.

inSlowQueueModal.title: Game added to the queue!
inSlowQueueModal.message: Once it finds the rest of the players, the game will appear in the My Games section of Home!
inSlowQueueModal.found: Other players have already been found for this game, you can play now by <0>clicking here</0>.

playableGamesMessage: You have games ready for your next move. Check them out now!

drawOfferedModal.title: Draw offered!
drawOfferedModal.messageSingular: {{player}} is offering a draw. Do you accept? The draw will only take effect if all players agree.
drawOfferedModal.messagePlural: {{players}} are offering a draw. Do you accept? The draw will only take effect if all players agree.

endTournamentRoundMessage: Are you sure you want to end the round? This will mark the players who are leading in unfinished games as winners.
altWarning: The use of alternate accounts to farm Elo is prohibited. If detected, actions may be taken against the accounts involved.
withdrawTournamentMessage: Are you sure you want to withdraw from the tournament?

steamBanner.title: Wishlist Lines of Battle on Steam!
steamBanner.description: Help us reach <0>{{wishlistCount}}</0> to launch the game!

offerDrawCooldownMessage: The last draw was offered a few turns ago. You may offer a new draw in {{turns}} turns.

acceptDrawModal.title: Accept Draw
acceptDrawModal.message: Are you sure you want to accept the draw?

translationsMessage: Do you want to collaborate with translations? You can do it <0>here</0>.
skirmishersInfo: Skirmishers are placed automatically depending on the number of units with skirmishers in the army and the skirmisher ratio of the battle type.
invitationCopied: Link copied! Send it to a friend.
copyLogsInstructions: Want to report a bug? Please take a screenshot, copy the logs, and send them to Leo.

serverUpdating.title: Server Updating
serverUpdating.message: The server is currently being updated. Please try again in a few minutes.

whatsNew.title: What's New
whatsNew.p1: Check out the latest updates and features in Lines of Battle!
whatsNew.p2: Stay tuned for more updates and new features coming to Lines of Battle!
whatsNew.p3: Follow us on social media for the latest news and announcements.

partyInfoDescription: Use the friend bar to invite friends to your party. Only party leaders can invite friends.
immuneToFlankRearBonuses: Immune to flank and rear bonuses
